div.p: My Father being obliged to leave town suddenly this morning directed me to write to You requesting you to make insurance on six hundred pounds sterlg in Rice shipped from St Simons, Georgia in the two sloops Jenny Cap Barker, and Cap Briggs sloop Mary bound to Boston and about to sail: and on seven hund & fifty pounds in Rice shipped from the same place in the Brigg Sally, Cap Chisholm for Philadelphia to sale in all this month.
at what premium can the preceding orders be effected Ross &Simpson May 22nd 97
please effect the above Insurances - R &S
